General.Name: Nationwide Building Society
General.Description: Nationwide Building Society, together with its subsidiaries, provides retail financial services in the United Kingdom. The company offers current, savings, and individual savings accounts; residential mortgages; overdrafts, personal loans, car loans, and home improvement loans; and credit cards. It also provides loans to registered social landlords, loans made under the private finance initiatives, and commercial real estate loans. In addition, the company offers home, life, income protection, travel, mobile phone, and breakdown insurance; and investment products and services, such as financial planning services. Further, it provides treasury liquidity, derivative, and discretionary services; and mobile and Internet banking services. Nationwide Building Society was founded in 1846 and is headquartered in Swindon, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Nationwide House, Swindon, United Kingdom, SN38 1NW
